sourcesContent:
import { Component, Output, EventEmitter } from '@angular/core'; import {FormControl, FormGroup} from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-sign-in', templateUrl: './sign-in.component.html', styleUrls: ['./sign-in.component.css'] }) export class SignInComponent { ngOnInit() { this.signInForm.reset(); } @Output()userOut = new EventEmitter(); signInForm= new FormGroup({ name: new FormControl(''), username: new FormControl(''), age: new FormControl(''), address: new FormControl(''), password: new FormControl('') }) addUser() { this.userOut.emit(this.signInForm.value); } }
